To solve the task, I will identify the relevant line items within the provided cash flow statement that refer to the decrease in amounts owed to the entity for goods or services sold or provided on credit during the period. This is typically represented by the line item "(Increase) Decrease in Accounts Receivable".

Examining the provided data:
- The relevant line item is:
  - **(Increase) Decrease in Accounts Receivable**: -3149338.94 

The negative value indicates a decrease in accounts receivable, which implies that the amounts owed to the entity have decreased during the reporting period.
